templates.content: You can go to Breadsticks + Extras and Add a Meat to select a Side of Bacon.
templates.name: How can I add extra Bacon?

templates.content: Most of our locations have gluten-friendly pasta that can be substituted on any dish. This would be listed under 'Customize/Extras' when you go to place your order. If it is not listed, you are welcome to check with your location directly to see if they can meet your request with an in-person order.
templates.name: Do you offer gluten free pasta at every restaurant?

templates.content: We don't currently offer free delivery, but all deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!
templates.name: Free shipping

templates.content: You can determine how many each complete meal will serve based on how many breadsticks come with the meal (2 per person). For example, if a meal comes with 8 breadsticks, it's designed to serve 4 people.
templates.name: How many people will this meal serve?/How much food comes in the family meal?

templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!
templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount

templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/accounts/login/?next=/fazolisitalian/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/Fazolis
templates.name: Social media

templates.content: Some whole pizzas are cooked to order, but the majority of our pizza is par-baked (one time through the bottom oven) and finished off to order (one final pass through the top/middle oven).
templates.name: Are the pizzas made to order or already baked?

templates.content: To find the phone number, hours, or address for a specific location, select the participating store here: https://order.fazolis.com/locations, click on 'begin order' and then choose 'store information' or 'view menus'.
templates.name: Phone support

templates.content:
If you have any questions regarding your online order, please contact the specific location for assistance.

You can find all locations here: https://order.fazolis.com/locations
templates.name: Customer support

templates.content: We have a rewards program where you can earn points to redeem on your favorites. Check it out here - https://fazolis.com/rewards
templates.name: Rewards / referral

templates.content: Yes we do. We specialize in business meetings, corporate events, family meals, holiday occasions, team dinners and weddings. You can begin your order online here: https://cater.fazolis.com/ If you'd like to get a quote, fill in the form at the bottom of this page: https://fazolis.com/catering Alternatively, you can call your local Fazoli's and our catering specialist will be happy to assist you.
templates.name: Do you offer catering?

templates.content: You can begin your order here https://order.fazolis.com/ by choosing  your location, delivery time and delivery type.
templates.name: Shipping time

templates.content:
You can find us near you here: https://order.fazolis.com/locations 

To find the phone number, hours, or address for a specific location, select a store, click on 'begin order' and then choose 'store information' or 'view menus'.
templates.name: Store location / retailer

templates.content: You'll find the discount box at checkout. After selecting your online order and clicking on the cart button, input your details and select "continue to payment". You'll see the discount box labeled "Coupon Code". Let me know if you still can't find it! I'll be here if you need me.
templates.name: Discount/Coupon Code Box

templates.content: While we are not able to customize orders online (other than the options listed), you are welcome to check with your location directly to see if they can meet your request with an in-person order!
templates.name: Can the order be customized?

templates.content: The Ultimate Sampler family meal serves 8.
templates.name: How many does ultimate family sampler feed?

templates.content: Yes, you can use this code while dining in. Just show the code to the cashier.
templates.name: Can I use the code in store?

templates.content: Online orders can be picked up in drive-thru. Please proceed to drive-thru, let them know you placed an online order, and provide the name on the order.
templates.name: I placed an online order. Should I go through the drive through to pickup, or park and go inside to pickup?

templates.content: Our lasagna does not contain pork.
templates.name: Does your  lasagna have pork in it?

templates.content: We're sorry to say that we cannot make changes via this method, for any changes you would need to contact your purchase location directly. You can find the location here: https://order.fazolis.com/locations To find the phone number for a specific location, select a store, click on 'begin order' and then choose 'store information' or 'view menus'.
templates.name: Cancel / edit order

templates.content: The small family meal is designed to serve 4, and the large is designed to serve 8!
templates.name: How many people does the family meal feed/servings?

templates.content: Our whole pizza pies are 14 inches.
templates.name: What size is a whole pizza pie?

templates.content: Our regular size is 10 oz pasta / 7 oz sauce.
templates.name: How big is the large Spaghetti with Meatballs?

templates.content: In the family meal that serves 4, you get 25 ounces of each pasta and 12 ounces of each sauce.
templates.name: How big are the portions that come in the family meal that serves 4?

templates.content:
Hi! Thanks for reaching out! Have you downloaded our rewards app? If you haven't, you can download here: https://fazolis.com/rewards/

You'll get $5 off $15 when you sign up!
templates.name: Do you have any discounts?
